item.description:
👤 Owner: sempicanha

📝 Repository: sempicanha/commilink

📄 Descrizione: CommiLink (CMLK) is a hybrid, secure communication protocol with multi-transport support, end-to-end encryption (E2EE), relay/store-and-forward, message rooms, and message revocation via tombstones.
